title: What's New?
content: You can now use a Ledger device to interact with the Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, Arbitrum, Avalanche, Rootstock, and Bitcoin networks!

title: Did you know you can...
content: Derive more addresses for your wallet in each network using the new multi-account feature in the top-right hamburger button
Set your preferred Custom RPC URL for EVM networks in Settings so your balances in that chain are checked using your Custom RPC
